H0.text: Which cricketer captained England to a record 54 test matches in 2001. Nasser Hussain

H1.text: Which cricketer captained England to a record 54 test matches in 2001. Michael Vaughan

H2.text: Which cricketer captained England to a record 54 test matches in 2001. Alec Stewart

H3.text: Which cricketer captained England to a record 54 test matches in 2001. Athers

A4.text: Hussain was captain of the England team for 45 Test matches from 1999 to 2003

A5.text: Later in 2003, Hussain announced his retirement as Test captain after England's Test series against South Africa, again being replaced by Vaughan

A6.text: England played their first T20I in 2005 under the captaincy of Michael Vaughan.

A7.text: England's captain, Calthorpe, was criticised for not enforcing the follow-on.
